title: Karma Coffee House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A restaurant and coffee house specializing in Chettinad South Indian home style cooking. Some menu items are dosa, chutneys, savory curries, flavor infused rices, made-in-house masala chai and Ayurvedic beverages. Also serves made-in-house coffee, espresso drinks, non coffee specialties and tea. Holds international movie events and welcome poetry slams and open mic. All food is 100% veg except for meat dishes added to menu on Friday evenings only.
